radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild interstitial pulmonary edema, with surgical clips in the mediastinum and a tortuous aorta with atherosclerotic calcification.
Periventricular and subcortical microangiopathic changes and atherosclerosis in the carotid siphons, with no evidence of intracranial hemorrhage, mass lesion, or territorial infarct.
Resistive indexes of the arcuate arteries of 0.84 to 1.00.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased resistive indexes compared with a study from 5 months previously, which showed indexes of 0.74 to 0.83.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Left ventricular ejection fraction of 64% and an estimated right ventricular systolic pressure of 68 mm Hg.
